data.name: STASIS: BONE TOTEM
data.detailed_description:
Follow the story of a husband and wife crew scouring the ocean trying to make a living. They stumble on an abandoned rig in the middle of the Pacific. Mac and Charlie don’t know that this facility has many secrets that Cayne Corporation would like to keep hidden.



This is no place for the faint of heart. Horrors and challenges are waiting to be unraveled. But the question is, do you want to go further and uncover all these secrets, or are you more focused on protecting your life and your family?




STASIS: BONE TOTEM will test your wits and genuinely push you to the limits in one of the most imaginative and engaging sci-fi horror stories in the STASIS universe yet.

BONE TOTEM comes with an exciting narrative, many gruesome elements, and similar gameplay to the best-selling adventure game STASIS. As you play, you will need to interact with the world and complete puzzles while learning more about this abandoned platform and its secrets.





  • Beautifully rendered isometric backgrounds
  • Switch between three unique characters, each with their own skills.
  • Use an innovative shared inventory system
  • Puzzles and story-based gameplay
  • Voiced characters
  • Explore a world full of rich deep history and lore that builds on the STASIS universe.
  • Full motion rendered video cut scenes
  • Ultrawide screen
  • Gamepad supported
  • 16:9 | 16:10 up to 4k

data.short_description: Experience the story of a husband and wife crew scouting the Pacific for stuff they can salvage. They stumble upon an abandoned rig, a place filled with secrets waiting to be uncovered. Solve puzzles in a horrific, engaging, and action-packed point-and-click adventure in the STASIS universe!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Russian, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Turkish, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1+ 64-bit or newer (Windows 10 recommended)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 @ 2.50 GHz / AMD Phenom II X3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX11 (shader model 4.0) capabilities.
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any DirectX Compatible Sound Card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit+
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2400 @ 3.10 GHz / AMD Phenom II X6 1100T
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX11 (shader model 4.0) capabilities.
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any DirectX Compatible Sound Card

Minimum:
